name: TheDarkShadow | Chapter 1: The Run Down
description:
Every donation will be put into making chapter 2 the bigger and best game! Help us!
TheDarkShadow

My youtube channel

**REMINDER: PRESS E TO PICK UP THINGS**

**I wish I can fix my mistake were I type uinty insted of unity**
You are sent The world is no longer the same. Everyone is in space. Only a few people were left on earth, and Sen was one of them. You must try and escape earth by finding a rocket. But you are not the only one on earth. In fact, people left earth for a reason, and you must survive the creatures that are with you! Good luck, you will need it.

ALSO just something to note out! bugs were you can't enter the slide or glitchy walls there all on purpose same for the pickup glitches Because Remember: THE WORLD ISN'T THE SAME
